languages.text: {n}В тела нападавших встроено множество аугментов, но при более близком рассмотрении вы понимаете, что это не просто импланты. Их устройство не оставляет сомнений в том, что погибшие были не людьми, а редкими высокофункциональными сервиторами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В тела нападавших встроено множество аугментов, но при более близком рассмотрении вы понимаете, что это не просто импланты. Их устройство не оставляет сомнений в том, что погибшие были не людьми, а редкими высокофункциональными сервиторами.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The bodies of the assailants are studded with many augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that they are not merely implants. Their construction makes it clear that the deceased were not humans but in fact rare high-functioning servitors.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В тела нападавших встроено множество аугментов, но при более близком рассмотрении вы понимаете, что это не просто импланты. Их устройство не оставляет сомнений в том, что погибшие были не людьми, а редкими высокофункциональными сервиторами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The bodies of the attackers have many augments built in, but upon closer inspection, you realise that those are not just implants. Their construction leaves no doubt that the deceased were not human, but in fact were the rare highly-functional Servitors.{/n}

{n}The bodies of the attackers have many augments built in, but upon closer inspection, you realise that those are not just implants. Their construction leaves no doubt that the deceased were not human, but in fact were the rare highly-functional Servitors.{/n}

{n}The bodies of the assailants have many embedded augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that those are not just implants. Their construction leaves no doubt that the deceased were not humans but in fact the rare high-functioning Servitors.{/n}

{n}The bodies of the assailants have many embedded augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that those are not just implants. Their construction leaves no doubt that the deceased were not humans but in fact the rare high-functioning Servitors.{/n}

{n}The bodies of the assailants are studded with many augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that they are not merely implants. Their construction makes it clear that the deceased were not humans but in fact rare high-functioning servitors.{/n}

{n}The bodies of the assailants are studded with many augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that they are not merely implants. Their construction makes it clear that the deceased were not humans but in fact rare high-functioning servitors.{/n}

languages.text: {n}襲撃者の身体には数々のオーグメティックがちりばめられているが、よく見ると、ただのインプラントではないとわかる。そのつくりから、故人は明らかに人間ではなく、貴重な高機能サーヴィターだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bodies of the assailants are studded with many augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that they are not merely implants. Their construction makes it clear that the deceased were not humans but in fact rare high-functioning servitors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}襲撃者の身体には数々のオーグメティックがちりばめられているが、よく見ると、ただのインプラントではないとわかる。そのつくりから、故人は明らかに人間ではなく、貴重な高機能サーヴィターだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}刺客的尸体上安装了许多植入物，但在经过仔细的观察后，你意识到这些装置不是普通的植入物。错综复杂的机械结构清楚地表明，这些死者不是普通的人类，而是高智能型机仆。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bodies of the assailants are studded with many augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that they are not merely implants. Their construction makes it clear that the deceased were not humans but in fact rare high-functioning servitors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}刺客的尸体上安装了许多植入物，但在经过仔细的观察后，你意识到这些装置不是普通的植入物。错综复杂的机械结构清楚地表明，这些死者不是普通的人类，而是高智能型奴工。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les corps des assaillants sont bardés d'augmétiques, mais en y regardant de plus près, vous vous rendez compte qu'il ne s'agit pas là de simples implants. Leur complexité ne laisse aucune place au doute : ces assaillants n'étaient pas des humains ordinaires, mais bien des servitors ultra-performants.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bodies of the assailants are studded with many augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that they are not merely implants. Their construction makes it clear that the deceased were not humans but in fact rare high-functioning servitors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les corps des assaillants sont bardés d'augmétiques, mais en y regardant de plus près, vous vous rendez compte qu'il ne s'agit pas là de simples implants. Leur complexité ne laisse aucune place au doute : ces assaillants n'étaient pas des humains ordinaires, mais bien des servitors ultra-performants.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los cuerpos de los asaltantes presentan numerosos auméticos, pero, al inspeccionarlos más de cerca, te das cuenta de que no son meros implantes. Su estructura no deja lugar a dudas de que los fallecidos no eran humanos, sino servidores de alto rendimiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bodies of the assailants are studded with many augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that they are not merely implants. Their construction makes it clear that the deceased were not humans but in fact rare high-functioning servitors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los cuerpos de los asaltantes tienen incorporados muchos auméticos, pero al inspeccionarlos más de cerca, te das cuenta de que no son meros implantes. Su estructura no deja lugar a dudas de que los fallecidos no eran humanos, sino servidores de alto rendimiento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Leichen der Angreifer sind mit zahlreichen integrierten Augmentationen ausgestattet. Bei genauerer Betrachtung erkennst du aber, dass es keine einfachen Implantate sind. Ihr Aufbau lässt keinen Zweifel, dass die Toten keine gewöhnlichen Menschen waren, sondern es sich um Exemplare der seltenen hochfunktionalen Servitoren handelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bodies of the assailants are studded with many augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that they are not merely implants. Their construction makes it clear that the deceased were not humans but in fact rare high-functioning servitors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Leichen der Angreifer sind mit integrierten Augmentationen ausgestattet. Bei genauerer Betrachtung erkennst du aber, dass es keine einfachen Implantate sind. Ihr Aufbau lässt keinen Zweifel, dass die Toten keine gewöhnlichen Menschen waren, sondern es sich um Exemplare der seltenen hochfunktionalen Servitoren handelt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Saldırganların vücutlarının her yanını kaplayan ogmetikleri yakından incelediğinde bunların basit implantlar olmadığını görüyorsun. Ölülerin sıradan insanlar değil de yüksek işlevli hizmetörler olduğu, implantların girift işçiliğinden açıkça anlaşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bodies of the assailants are studded with many augmetics, but upon closer inspection, you realise that they are not merely implants. Their construction makes it clear that the deceased were not humans but in fact rare high-functioning servitors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Saldırganların vücutları ogmetiklerle dolu. Fakat yakından incelediğinde bunların basit implantlar olmadığını görüyorsun. Ölülerin sıradan insanlar değil de yüksek işlevli hizmetörler olduğu, implantların girift işçiliğinden açıkça anlaşılıyor.{/n}
